name: Famine (Alexey Khazov)
description:
Famine is a 2.5D puzzle platformer game where you play as a boy lost in a forest, trying to catch a magnificent, glowing butterfly. 

This is a short atmospheric game demo with some platforming, stealth, puzzles, and chases.

The controls are very simple: arrow keys to move, CTRL to grab items that the boy attempts to walk around (rocks and logs).

The trailer was made before the game was textured. Please excuse the lack of colors :)

Credits:

Alexey Khazov

Brandon Van Doorn
